content: Shares of Envision Healthcare Corp  plunged by more than a third on Wednesday after the ambulatory surgery services provider gave a disappointing profit forecast for the current quarter.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Envision Healthcare shares plunge after 'alarming' forecast

content: Nov 1 Shares of Envision Healthcare Corp plunged by more than a third on Wednesday after the ambulatory surgery services provider gave a disappointing profit forecast for the current quarter.

title: Envision Healthcare shares plunge after "alarming" forecast

content: Envision Healthcare Corp  said on Tuesday it would sell its ambulance business to buyout firm KKR & Co  in an all-cash deal valued at $2.4 billion as it sharpens its focus on its core businesses.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Envision to sell ambulance business to KKR in $2.4 billion deal

content: Aug 8 Envision Healthcare Corp said on Tuesday it would sell its ambulance business to buyout firm KKR & Co in an all-cash deal valued at $2.4 billion as it sharpens its focus on its core businesses.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Envision to sell ambulance business to KKR in $2.4 bln deal

content: Aug 8 Envision Healthcare Corp said it would sell its medical transportation unit  American Medical Response  to buyout firm KKR & Co's portfolio company  Air Medical Group Holdings  in a deal valued at $2.4 billion.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Envision to sell ambulance business to KKR in $2.4 bln deal

content: * Envision Healthcare Corp - ‍transaction will be structured as a cash acquisition of AMR from Envision valued at $2.4 billion.​
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: BRIEF-Envision Healthcare to sell American Medical Response in a deal for ‍$2.4 bln

content: Buyout firm KKR & Co LLP  is in advanced talks to buy Envision Healthcare Corp's  ambulance business and merge it with Air Medical Group  a medical helicopter operator it acquired two years ago  people familiar with the matter said.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Exclusive: Buyout firm KKR in lead to acquire Envision's ambulance unit - sources

content: TeamHealth Holdings Inc  on Monday said private equity firm Blackstone Group LP  would buy it for $6.1 billion  in a deal meant to help the U.S. hospital staffing company better cope with pricing pressure during a wave of consolidation.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Blackstone to buy TeamHealth for $6.1 billion

content: Oct 18 Blackstone Group LP is the lead bidder to acquire Team Health Holdings Inc  the U.S. hospital staffing provider that has been the target of activist funds  including Jana Partners LLC  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Blackstone in the lead to acquire Team Health -sources

content: Envision Healthcare Holdings Inc  and AmSurg Corp  have agreed to an all-stock merger that would create a healthcare service provider with a proforma market value of about $10 billion  the companies said on Wednesday.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Healthcare service providers Envision  AmSurg to merge

content: June 15 Envision Healthcare Holdings Inc  and AmSurg Corp have agreed to an all-stock merger that would create a healthcare service provider with a proforma market value of about $10 billion  the companies said on Wednesday.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Healthcare service providers Envision  AmSurg to merge

content: Envision Healthcare Holdings Inc and AmSurg Corp said they would merge in an all-stock deal to create a healthcare service provider with a proforma market value of about $10 billion.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Healthcare service providers Envision  AmSurg to merge

content: * Combined organization will have a pro forma market capitalization of approximately $10 billion and enterprise value of approximately $15 billion
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: BRIEF-Envision Healthcare and AmSurg to merge

content: June 15 Envision Healthcare Holdings Inc  and Amsurg Corp said they would merge in an all-stock deal to create a healthcare service provider with a proforma market value of about $10 billion.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Healthcare service providers Envision  Amsurg to merge

content: Envision Healthcare Holdings Inc  is in advanced talks to merge with AmSurg Corp   in a deal that would combine two of the largest U.S. outsourced physician services providers  people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Envision Healthcare in talks to merge with AmSurg: sources

content: June 8 Medical service providers Envision Healthcare Holdings Inc is in advanced talks to merge with AmSurg Corp  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: Envision Healthcare Corporation
title: Envision Healthcare in talks to merge with AmSurg -sources

content: June 8 Envision Healthcare Holdings Inc  is in advanced talks to merge with AmSurg Corp  in a deal that would combine two of the largest U.S. outsourced physician services providers  people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.
